findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables that initialize only in the constructor are not defined as `immutable`.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code (code that is never executed or reached during normal contract execution) can increase the size of the contract and the cost of deploying and interacting with it.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables configured on user-supplied input are missing proper checks for zero values, which can lead to problems when the contract is executed.
